title: Backend Developer to Effektify
description:
Do you thrive on system building and integrations? HiCareer is supporting Effektify in their search for an experienced Backend Developer to elevate their AI-enhanced marketing solution.
  
  

**About Effektify:**  

Founded in 2021, Effektify is rapidly expanding and making waves in the marketing and analytics space—reminiscent of the early stages of Spotify or PayPal. From their headquarters in Halmstad to their teams in Jönköping, Stockholm, and Berlin, Effektify is on a mission to revolutionize marketing and enhance digital sales.
  
Their unique product integrates data from sources like Meta, WooCommerce, Shopify, GA4, and more, all consolidated into one app enhanced by AI and ML technologies to help businesses make smarter marketing decisions.
  
With a team that has grown from 3 to over 45 employees in just four years, Effektify is scaling globally while continuously enhancing its capabilities.
  
  

**Role Overview:**  

Effektify is seeking an experienced Backend Developer to join their growing tech team. This role focuses on developing and maintaining backend systems, ensuring seamless integration and optimal performance. You will play a critical role in building and scaling their systems during an important growth phase.
  
  

**What You’ll Do:**  

Design, develop, and maintain robust backend systems and services.
  
Work on integration projects, connecting various systems and ensuring seamless data flow.
  
Manage and optimize databases, ensuring data integrity and performance.
  
Collaborate closely with frontend developers, data engineers, and AI/ML experts to create cohesive and innovative solutions.
  
Contribute to architectural and strategic planning with the tech team and leadership.
  
Stay updated with emerging technologies and propose improvements to the tech stack.
  
  

**Your Skills and Experience:**  

Proven experience in building and maintaining backend systems.
  
Proficiency in PHP8, Laravel, and/or TypeScript, with a strong foundation in system and product development.
  
Hands-on experience with integration work and database management.
  
Knowledge of frontend technologies, data engineering, and AI/ML is a plus.
  
Proactive and independent work style, with the ability to bring forward ideas that drive improvements and innovation.
  
  

**Team Structure and Technologies:**  

Effektify's tech team comprises around six talented individuals, including a CTO, frontend developers, and an AI/Data Lead, supported by external consultants. This structure provides ample opportunity to influence the direction and technology choices of their products.
  
Some examples of the stack they work with today include PHP8/Laravel, TypeScript, Angular, React, NoSQL, and AWS. However, Effektify remains flexible with their tech stack, always aiming for smarter solutions and iterative development.
  
Why Join Effektify?
  
Be part of a company that values innovation and user-centric products.
  
Work in a fast-paced environment that challenges the status quo in the marketing tech industry.
  
Gain significant influence over product development directions and technology decisions.
  
Collaborate with a diverse group of passionate developers making a meaningful impact.
  
  

**Workplace Type:**  

Effektify welcomes candidates at their new office in Halmstad a couple of days a week but is flexible to ensure the best fit for the team.
  
  

**Next Steps:**  

**Short Intro Call:** Speak with Fredrik at HiCareer (20-30 min).
  
**In-Depth Interview:** Meet with Martin Lundin, CTO (45-60 min).
  
**Coding Test or Work Review:** Showcase your skills.
  
**Final Meeting:** Meet Mattias, Founder & CEO (45-60 min).
  
  

Interested?
  
If you’re ready to contribute to a dynamic team and push the boundaries of what’s possible in tech and marketing, Effektify could be the perfect fit.
  
Show your interest today through HiCareer, and let’s see where this journey takes you!

title: PHP Developer
description:
Jobbify är en jobbplattform för vassa kandidater.
  
  

För kunds räkning har vi publicerat denna annons, vill du komma i kontakt med den slutgiltiga arbetsgivaren kan du klicka dig vidare till annonsen:
  
  

Om Starweb
  
  

Vill du vara med och skapa morgondagens e-handelsupplevelse tillsammans med oss? Isåfall är Starweb det rätta valet för dig.
  
  

Här på Starweb har vi jobbat med e-handel i 20 års tid och vi brinner för att hjälpa våra kunder med deras e-handelsresa. Vi vill vara det absoluta förstahandsvalet för kunder som vill samla alla delar av sin e-handel hos oss – från plattform till design, strategi och digital marknadsföring.
  
  

Nu befinner vi oss i en otroligt spännande del av vår tillväxtresa, då vi under det gångna året har påbörjat en sammanslagning med det Malmöbaserade bolaget Nordisk E-handel där vi med gemensamma krafter tar fram ett nytt och modernt erbjudande till marknaden. Det innebär att vi nu är ett fantastiskt gäng medarbetare som sätter hög tilltro till innovation, engagemang och att alltid försöka göra det lilla extra för att våra kunder ska lyckas. Det är här du kommer in i bilden.
  
  

Om rollen
  
  

Nu söker vi en PHP Developer till vårt härliga gäng i Malmö – kan det vara du? Vi ser gärna att du har starka färdigheter inom webbutveckling och e-handel. Dessutom är du analytisk, har ett sant öga för detaljer och delar visionen att kontinuerligt sträva efter att leverera morgondagens e-handelslösning. Du delar även tilltron att vi tillsammans gör skillnad – vilket i praktiken innebär ett tätt samarbete i team där ödmjukhet och teamet framför jaget hamnar i första rummet.
  
  

**Som PHP Developer ansvarar du för att:**  

Utveckla och underhålla PHP-baserade applikationer och mikrotjänster för vår e-handelsplattform.
  
  

Samarbeta med andra utvecklare och tekniska team för att designa, implementera och testa nya funktioner och förbättringar.
  
  

**Integrera och arbeta med olika tjänster och API:** er för att förbättra funktionaliteten och prestandan hos vår plattform.
  
  

Bidra till tekniska diskussioner och beslut kring systemarkitektur, prestandaoptimering och säkerhet.
  
  

**Kvalifikationer för rollen:**  

Minst 3 års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet.
  
  

Erfarenhet av PHP-utveckling och kunskap om ramverk som Laravel eller Symfony.
  
  

Erfarenhet av att samarbeta med cross-funktionella team för att leverera mjukvarulösningar.
  
  

God förståelse för webbteknologier som HTML, CSS, JavaScript och relaterade ramverk.
  
  

Utmärkta problemlösningsförmågor och förmåga att arbeta självständigt såväl som i team.
  
  

**Meriterande om du har kunskap inom:**  

E-handelsplattformar och dess utmaningar
  
  

Molnbaserade plattformar som AWS eller GCP
  
  

Micro services
  
  

Vi erbjuder en dynamisk och stimulerande arbetsmiljö där du får möjlighet att växa och utvecklas som professionell. Om du delar vår passion i att skapa innovativa lösningar inom e-handel och vill vara en del av vårt team är detta rätt tillfälle för dig. Känner du att det är dig vi söker? Välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Senior Fullstackutvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Jobbeskrivning**  

Tillsammans med de andra medlemmarna i teamet kommer du att utveckla vår digitala plattform samt arbeta i det befintliga CMSet och stötta i att avveckla det.  

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* Fullstackutvecklare med tyngd i backend och minst fem års erfarenhet av .Net,
* Minst tre års erfarenhet av Typescript *Uppfyller*
* Minst fem års vana av att jobba med modern produktutveckling i ett agilt team
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av att jobba med databaser, tex MS SQL
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av CI/CD (tex. workflows i GitHub Actions)
* Du är duktig på att kommunicera på svenska i tal och skrift.
* Har förståelse för modern arkitektur med moduler och microtjänster
* Van vid backend-integrationer till andra system.
* Vana att bygga system med höga leveranskrav/redundanskrav
* Van att ta beslut samt att presentera och argumentera för olika lösningar
* Minst två års dokumenterad erfarenhet av Kubernetes
* *Erfarenhet av något mo**dernt* *frontendramverk* – vi använder *react**.*
* Har tidigare jobbat med publiceringsplattform (CMS) eller poddar

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 10-12-2024  

  

**Om Deploja**  

Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.  

  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?

 *Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Integrationsutvecklare till institution i Umeå
description:
**Integrationsutvecklare till Umeå – Spännande roll med fokus på systemintegrationer**

**Detta är ett konsultuppdrag genom Northern Skill med bra villkor och hög flexibilitet.**

 **Om uppdraget:**  

Vi söker vi nu en erfaren Integrationsutvecklare. I denna roll kommer du att arbeta med design och utveckling av integrationslösningar, där behovsfångst, utredningar och lösningsdesign är centrala delar av uppdraget. Fokus ligger på att skapa robusta och hållbara systemintegrationer inom en Microsoftmiljö.


Som en del av leveransorganisationen för IT-utveckling inom CIMT kommer du att bidra till flera spännande projekt och uppdrag inom Region Västerbotten. Vi söker en självständig och kommunikativ person som trivs i att samarbeta i team och är villig att ta ansvar för sina uppgifter.

**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter kommer att vara:**

* Design och utveckling av integrationslösningar, med fokus på systemintegrationer inom hälso- och sjukvård.
* Fånga upp behov och genomföra utredningar för att skapa anpassade lösningar i samarbete med verksamheten.
* Testa och kvalitetssäkra vårdinformation inför migrering mellan vårdinformationssystem.
* Arbeta nära verksamheten för att förstå deras behov och designa robusta och effektiva integrationslösningar.
* Arbeta i ett agilt team som följer Scrum-metodik för att säkerställa leveranser av hög kvalitet.

**Vi söker dig som har:**

* Minst 4 års erfarenhet av att arbeta som BizTalk-utvecklare de senaste 5 åren.
* Erfarenhet av utveckling i C# och .NET.
* Erfarenhet av utveckling och förvaltning av integrationslösningar i Microsoftmiljö.
* Erfarenhet av att designa och utveckla integrationslösningar på en integrationsplattform.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med test och kvalitetssäkring av vårdinformation inför migrering mellan vårdinformationssystem inom hälso- och sjukvården.
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt och ta ansvar, men även samarbeta effektivt inom team.
* Flytande svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta enligt Scrum och andra agila metoder.

**Meriterande:**

* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med integrationer inom hälso- och sjukvården.

**Omfattning och varaktighet:**

  

* Start: Omgående efter avtalets undertecknande
* Slut: 2026-12-31
* Plats: Umeå, Universitetsområdet

**Vad vi erbjuder:**

* En möjlighet att arbeta med viktiga och utvecklande integrationslösningar inom hälso- och sjukvård.
* Ett engagerat team och möjlighet att bidra till flera innovativa projekt och uppdrag.
* Region Västerbotten tillhandahåller en standard arbetsplats med utrustning som dator och skärm.

**Ansökan:**  

Låter detta som en utmaning för dig? Ansök direkt via vårt system och bifoga:

* Ditt uppdaterade CV på svenska
* Information om din tillgänglighet


Välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Full-Stack Developer
description:
* Malmö, Sweden (Hybrid)
* Permanent

 Neg (Up to 60,000 SEK p* month)
**REF: 11205**
**Full-Stack Developer – Cyber Security | Malmö, Sweden (Hybrid)**



Our client, a prestigious tech firm based in Malmö, Sweden, is seeking a talented Full-Stack Developer to join their team, working on innovative solutions in the fast-paced world of cybersecurity. This hybrid role offers the flexibility of remote work, alongside the collaborative benefits of in-office engagement.


**Why You’ll Love This Role:**


* **Competitive Salary:** Earn up to 60,000 SEK per month, based on experience and expertise.
* **Stock Options:** Participate in the company’s growth through a stock option plan, adding long-term value to your compensation.
* **Professional Growth:** Work in a stimulating environment that fosters continuous learning and development, with a focus on cutting-edge Cyber Security technologies.
* **Hybrid Work Environment:** Enjoy the perfect balance of working from home and collaborating with a highly skilled team at the Malmö office.
* **Exciting Projects:** Be part of a team constantly pushing technological boundaries by regularly releasing new code and working on innovative projects.


**What We’re Looking For:**


* **Backend Development skills:** Strong experience with backend services that run on JVM (Kotlin knowledge is advantageous).
* **Frontend Development skills:** Not being afraid to contribute to React & TypeScript code occasionally.
* **Cyber Security Passion:** Previous experience or a genuine interest in cybersecurity is highly desirable.
* **CICD Expertise:** Experience with Continuous IntegrationContinuous Deployment (CICD) pipelines, containers, tooling and Linux Security Modules (LSM).
* **Collaborative Spirit:** Proven track record of working effectively in teams that regularly release code, demonstrating strong communication and teamwork skills.
* **Start-upScale-up Experience:** Experience in a start-up or scale-up environment is a plus, showcasing adaptability and an entrepreneurial mindset.


**Additional Details:**


* **Location Flexibility:** While Malmö is preferred, candidates based in Stockholm will also be considered, reflecting the company’s flexible approach to recruitment.
* **Visa Requirements:** Please note that visa sponsorship is not available for this role.


This is an incredible opportunity to join a forward-thinking company at the forefront of technology and Cyber Security.



If you would like to learn more about this vacancy, please apply using the button above or send a copy of your CV to ryan.b@weareorbis.com


* + **Consultant:** Ryan Brown

  


At Orbis Group, we are committed to creating an inclusive and diverse workplace. Research indicates that candidates, especially from underrepresented backgrounds, often hesitate to apply for jobs if they don't meet every qualification.  

  

If you're excited about a role but don't perfectly align with every requirement, we encourage you to apply. Your unique skills and experiences may be the perfect fit for the job or other opportunities that arise.

title: Backend/Full-stack Developer
description:
* Sweden (Remote)
* Permanent

 65,000 SEK p* month
**REF: 11481**
**BackendFull-Stack Developer – Telecommunications (Remote, Sweden)**



Are you a talented developer looking to make an impact in the telecommunications industry? Our client is offering an exciting **remote** opportunity that allows you to work from **anywhere in Sweden**. Join a forward-thinking team where innovation, flexibility, and cutting-edge technology come together.


**About the Role**



In this **permanent** position, you’ll play a crucial role in designing and developing backend and full-stack solutions that drive the future of telecommunications. You’ll collaborate with a skilled team on high-impact projects, with the flexibility to work from your preferred location. With a **competitive salary** of up to **65,000 SEK per month**, this role rewards your expertise and dedication.



Key Responsibilities


* Develop and maintain scalable backend solutions using **.NetC#**.
* Work on full-stack projects, integrating **T-SQL** database solutions.
* Enhance and optimize frontend applications using **React.js** and **TypeScript**.
* Ensure code quality and best practices through continuous improvement and testing.
* Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions.


Required Skills and Experience


* Proficiency in **C#** and **.NET 6** development.
* Strong experience with **ASP.NET MVC**.
* Solid understanding of **JavaScript** and **Knockout.js**.
* Familiarity with **WebForms**.
* **Fluency in Swedish** is mandatory.


Desirable Skills


* Experience with **React.js** and **TypeScript**.
* Strong mathematical and problem-solving skills.


**Why Join?**



This role is perfect for developers who thrive in a **remote** working environment and are passionate about both backend and full-stack development. You’ll be joining a **pioneering team** in the telecommunications sector, where your contributions will directly shape the future of the industry.



Enjoy the freedom of remote work while being part of innovative projects that challenge and inspire you.



If you’re interested in learning more about this position, please apply using the button above or send a copy of your CV to ryan.b@weareorbis.com


* + **Consultant:** Ryan Brown

  


At Orbis Group, we are committed to creating an inclusive and diverse workplace. Research indicates that candidates, especially from underrepresented backgrounds, often hesitate to apply for jobs if they don't meet every qualification.  

  

If you're excited about a role but don't perfectly align with every requirement, we encourage you to apply. Your unique skills and experiences may be the perfect fit for the job or other opportunities that arise.

title: CIDAN Machinery Group söker IT-utvecklare
description:
#### **Om rollen**


I rollen som IT-utvecklare kommer du att bli en central del i IT teamet och ha en avgörande roll i att utveckla företagets interna affärsprocesser så väl som förvaltning och support samt deltaga i olika framgångsrika projekt. Dina ansvarsområden inkluderar:

#### **Arbetsuppgifter**

* Arbete med processflöden och förbättringsarbete:
	+ Du kommer att vara involverad i att analysera och optimera våra befintliga processer och processflöden samt säkerställa att de fungerar ihop med vårt ERP system.
* Genom att driva förbättringsarbete och supportera användarna kommer du att hjälpa till att öka effektiviteten och maximera affärs- och verksamhetsnyttan för våra projekt och den vardagliga driften.
* Hantering av kravändringar  

Du kommer att säkerställa att kravändringar i verksamhetens system hanteras på ett korrekt sätt. Detta inkluderar att definiera och dokumentera ändringar för att säkerställa en smidig och kontrollerad process.
* Tvärfunktionellt arbete:
  

Du kommer att samarbeta med olika bolag inom koncernen. Du kommer att vara involverad i utvecklingen av nya lösningar, vilket innebär spännande och utmanande möjligheter att forma framtiden för våra produkter och tjänster.
* Du kommer att vara med vid utveckling av nya funktioner, testa, utbilda, dokumentera, implementera samt supportera lösningen efter implementering
* Du kommer även att spela en central roll för våra anställda gällande IT support.

#### **Din profil**


I denna tjänst som IT-utvecklare på Cidan Machinery väger personlighet och arbetslivserfarenhet tyngre än utbildning. Vi letar efter dig som är en lagspelare och som kan arbeta självständigt och ta ditt ansvar i teamet. Vidare har du en förmåga att förklara på ett pedagogiskt sätt och kan snabbt sätta dig in företaget vardagliga problem och lösa situationen som uppstått.


Att arbeta som IT-utvecklare hos Cidan Machinery kommer innebära kontakt med många olika kunder (interna, så väl som från andra Cidan bolag) där du måste ha tålamod och alltid tänka på att ge kunden den bästa servicen. Du bör också vara flexibel, gilla utmaningar, vara problemlösningsorienterad och tycka det är kul att förbättra och effektivisera processer.

* Eftergymnasial utbildning med inriktning mot IT-området eller motsvarande kunskaper förvärvade på annat sätt som arbetsgivaren bedömer likvärdigt
* Erfarenhet som lägst "Super user" inom ett modernt ERP system under de senaste 3 åren
* Kunskaper inom Microsoft AD och säkerhetsuppsättning.
* Har du erfarenheter inom Low code och API integrationer mellan olika system, är det meriterande.
* Aktuell kompetens som IT-tekniker/supporter
* Givetvis behärskar Du svenska och engelska flytande i tal och skrift, övriga språkkunskaper som tyska är meriterande

#### **Mål och nyckeltal**

Vi följer regelbundet upp framdriften i vår ständiga utveckling, vilket medför att vi är vana att hålla deadlines samtidigt som vi inte ger avkall på säkerhet eller funktionalitet.

#### **Vad vi erbjuder**


Du kommet bli en del av vår IT-avdelning som är placerade både i Sverige , USA och i Österrike.  

Vi går till jobbet med ett leende på läpparna och ser fram emot att ta oss an nya och spännande uppgifter, samt att dagligen möta medarbetare som har samma driv och engagemang som du har.  

På CIDAN Machinery har vi en stolt vana av att låta våra medarbetare växa både inom sitt ansvarsområde men också inom företaget.


Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid med start enligt överenskommelse.

### **Våra kärnvärden**


På CIDAN Machinery bygger vi vår verksamhet och kultur på våra kärnvärden:

* **Professionell**: Vi strävar alltid efter högsta kvalitet och expertis i allt vi gör.
* **Tillsammans**: Vi tror på kraften i samarbete och att vi når längre som ett team.
* **Hållbarhet**: Vi tar ansvar för framtiden och arbetar för långsiktiga och miljövänliga lösningar.
* **Förändringsbenägen**: Vi omfamnar utveckling och ser förändring som en möjlighet.
* **Passionerad**: Vi drivs av engagemang och glädje i vårt arbete.


Vill du vara en del av ett företag som lever sina värderingar? Ansök idag och bli en del av vårt team!  

  

Har du frågor kring tjänsten?  

Kontakta rekryterande chef **Anders Åkesson** på **aak@cidanmachinery.com**

title: Android Developer
description:
Are you an Android development expert with a passion for creating innovative applications? Do you thrive in dynamic environments and enjoy tackling complex challenges? SiNIX invites you to join our mission to revolutionize technology solutions across diverse industries.

**Who We're Looking For**  

We seek Android developers who are not just experienced but passionate about making a tangible impact. You should have:

* An MSc in system development or equivalent.
* Knowledge of the Android platform (Android Automotive and AOSP).
* At least 5 years of experience in system development with Java and/or C++ in a Linux environment.
* Experience working in agile environments and knowledge of CI/CD.
* Proficiency with tools like GIT, Jira, Confluence, and Python.


At SiNIX, you'll dive into projects spanning autonomous vehicles (ADAS), Active Safety, IoT, Application development, Cyber security, 5G and MedTech. We embrace project-based assignments, full-team deliveries, and flexible staffing, ensuring both variety and depth in your work.

**Our Offer**  

With us, you set your own salary, and the majority of the surplus from your assignment goes to your plan for bonuses, education, insurance, vacation days, parental leave, pension, stock savings, etc. This flexible model has proven to be suitable for developers who have experienced conventional compensation models but desire more freedom.

**About SiNIX**  

As a leader in software consultancy, SiNIX Application thrives at the intersection of cloud computing and on-premise solutions. Our expertise spans across custom software development, full-stack cloud solutions, security enhancements, and the innovative realms of Kubernetes and IoT. We cherish the value each colleague brings to our team, fostering an environment where sharing skills and memorable experiences is part of our daily routine.


At SiNIX, we prioritize the value of our colleagues by creating memorable experiences and sharing skills. We empower our employees with choices in training, vacation time, and flexible salaries, fostering a supportive and thriving work environment. We aim to inspire ongoing growth and development, making success a shared journey.

**Apply now**  

...and explore how your expertise can contribute to our shared success and innovation.

title: Senior Software Developer - Aimo Customer Solutions
description:
*We have embarked on an exciting new journey with the goal of becoming the most attractive partner in mobility. We aim to contribute to healthy and sustainable social development by offering mobility services that make cities smarter and everyday life easier.*

### **About the job**

**Ownership | Autonomy | Fun**


Are you ready to take full ownership of your work and thrive in a team where autonomy and collaboration go hand in hand? Join us and contribute to building impactful products in a fast-paced environment with modern technology—all while having fun along the way.

### **What’s the Role About?**


As a Senior Software Developer at Aimo, you will be part of a team of experienced members who thrive on learning and teaching! The team owns solutions for business customers and partners, such as the Customer Portal, Developer Portal, APIs, and Identity and Login systems. It’s a growing area and crucial for the company.

#### **Who You Are**

* Convinced your work is about creating customer value


* A jack-of-all-trades with a liking for the bird's-eye perspective


* A Full Stack developer familiar with our tech stack


* A person who sees testing as a necessary evil but actually finds it really helpful


* Someone embracing DevSecOps—observability and IaC have your full interest



### **Your Toolkit:**

* 4+ years of front-end experience with React


* 4+ years of back-end experience with Node.js and/or Java Spring Boot


* Solid knowledge of TypeScript


* Good understanding of OAuth2


* Bachelor’s/Engineering degree or equivalent relevant for the role


### **How We Work**


We’re a hybrid team. Whether we’re at the office or working remotely, collaboration is key. We deploy fast and often (sometimes 10-20 times a day) and are not afraid to fail small and learn big.


We get excited about tackling tricky challenges. We take pride in improving the product every day, whether it needs refactoring, addressing tech debt, or making architectural improvements.

#### **Our Tech Stack**


Here’s the tech we work with:

* **Frontend**: React, React Native, TypeScript, JavaScript
* **Backend**: Node.js, Java Spring Boot, GraphQL, Express.js
* **Cloud**: AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, GitLab pipelines
* **Databases**: MongoDB, DynamoDB
* **Other tools**: OAuth2, Spring Security, Swagger/OpenAPI, Datadog


If you don’t know every single one of these, no worries. We’ll help you pick up what you need.

### **Why Join Us?**


If you're looking for a role where your work directly enhances our customers' experience, we offer a space where you can share your expertise, learn from others, and truly contribute. If you're ready to apply your skills in a setting that values collaboration and a servant-leadership mindset, we'd like to hear from you.

### **About us**


We are owned by the Japanese company Sumitomo Corporation. With a focus on innovation and human needs, Sumitomo continuously develops new mobility solutions and innovations that make people's everyday lives easier.


This role is located at our headquarters in **Stockholm**, and you need to be able to be on-site when the business requires it.


Aimo is now on an exciting journey of change, striving to become the most innovative company in the industry. With us, you will have the opportunity to participate in creating something new!

title: Senior Software Developer - Aimo Customer Solutions
description:
*We have embarked on an exciting new journey with the goal of becoming the most attractive partner in mobility. We aim to contribute to healthy and sustainable social development by offering mobility services that make cities smarter and everyday life easier.*

### **About the job**

**Ownership | Autonomy | Fun**


Are you ready to take full ownership of your work and thrive in a team where autonomy and collaboration go hand in hand? Join us and contribute to building impactful products in a fast-paced environment with modern technology—all while having fun along the way.

### **What’s the Role About?**


As a Senior Software Developer at Aimo, you will be part of a team of experienced members who thrive on learning and teaching! The team owns solutions for business customers and partners, such as the Customer Portal, Developer Portal, APIs, and Identity and Login systems. It’s a growing area and crucial for the company.

#### **Who You Are**

* Convinced your work is about creating customer value


* A jack-of-all-trades with a liking for the bird's-eye perspective


* A Full Stack developer familiar with our tech stack


* A person who sees testing as a necessary evil but actually finds it really helpful


* Someone embracing DevSecOps—observability and IaC have your full interest



### **Your Toolkit:**

* 4+ years of front-end experience with React


* 4+ years of back-end experience with Node.js and/or Java Spring Boot


* Solid knowledge of TypeScript


* Good understanding of OAuth2


* Bachelor’s/Engineering degree or equivalent relevant for the role


### **How We Work**


We’re a hybrid team. Whether we’re at the office or working remotely, collaboration is key. We deploy fast and often (sometimes 10-20 times a day) and are not afraid to fail small and learn big.


We get excited about tackling tricky challenges. We take pride in improving the product every day, whether it needs refactoring, addressing tech debt, or making architectural improvements.

#### **Our Tech Stack**


Here’s the tech we work with:

* **Frontend**: React, React Native, TypeScript, JavaScript
* **Backend**: Node.js, Java Spring Boot, GraphQL, Express.js
* **Cloud**: AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, GitLab pipelines
* **Databases**: MongoDB, DynamoDB
* **Other tools**: OAuth2, Spring Security, Swagger/OpenAPI, Datadog


If you don’t know every single one of these, no worries. We’ll help you pick up what you need.

### **Why Join Us?**


If you're looking for a role where your work directly enhances our customers' experience, we offer a space where you can share your expertise, learn from others, and truly contribute. If you're ready to apply your skills in a setting that values collaboration and a servant-leadership mindset, we'd like to hear from you.

### **About us**


We are owned by the Japanese company Sumitomo Corporation. With a focus on innovation and human needs, Sumitomo continuously develops new mobility solutions and innovations that make people's everyday lives easier.


This role is located at our headquarters in **Stockholm**, and you need to be able to be on-site when the business requires it.


Aimo is now on an exciting journey of change, striving to become the most innovative company in the industry. With us, you will have the opportunity to participate in creating something new!

title: Systemutvecklare till PTS
description:
*Vill du bidra till utvecklingen av digitala tjänster som påverkar samhället och är tillgängliga för alla? På PTS it-utvecklingsenhet får du möjligheten att arbeta med avancerade systemutvecklingsprojekt i en prestigelös och utvecklingsinriktad miljö. Här väntar en roll där du kan göra skillnad i en statlig it-verksamhet.*


**Vi jobbar med det alla tar för givet. Att kunna kommunicera.** **Hos oss får du se till att det fungerar nu och i framtiden. För alla.**



Enheten för it-utveckling ansvarar för utveckling och förvaltning av PTS it-system, webbplatser och e-tjänster, med målet att säkerställa att myndigheten är en enklare, öppnare och effektivare organisation genom digitalisering. Vi samordnar och driver PTS strategiska it-utveckling och ser till att de system som används fungerar bra för alla. Vi ansvarar för nyutveckling och förvaltning av befintliga it-lösningar, såväl e-tjänster, webbplatser som verksamhetssystem. Dessutom säkerställer vi att lagkrav uppfylls och att regeringsuppdrag kopplade till datadelning och digitalisering bevakas och hanteras. IT-miljön på PTS driftas on premise och har sin bas i Microsoft-stacken, men vi har även en containerbaserad miljö i open source.



”*Jag som kommer att vara din chef heter Charlotte Örnlid. Jag är en erfaren it-chef som är lyhörd, strukturerad och bidrar till god stämning.”*


**Om rollen**  

Som systemutvecklare på PTS kommer du att förvalta och vidareutveckla befintliga applikationer utvecklade i MVC och .NET, samt arbeta med utveckling och förvaltning av CI/CD-pipelines och automatiserade tester. Du kommer att genomföra system- och enhetstester inför driftsättning, arbeta proaktivt med säkerhetshöjande åtgärder och delta i uppdrag tillsammans med kravanalytiker och projektledare. Rollen innebär också att du bidrar till utvecklingen av gemensamma utvecklarprinciper, integrationslösningar och tillgänglighetsarbete. Den inledande arbetsuppgiften är att vidareutveckla två register byggda i MVC.


**Om teamet**  

På enheten är vi 14 medarbetare i rollerna projektledare, kravanalytiker, it-arkitekt och systemutvecklare.


**Om dig**  

Du är samarbetsorienterad och trivs med att arbeta prestigelöst och har ett gemensamt mål i fokus. Med din lyhördhet bidrar du till ett positivt samarbete genom att dela med dig av din kunskap, både inom teamet och till andra delar av verksamheten. Du är självgående och tar initiativ för att få saker att hända. Genom att strukturerat och självständigt planera och genomföra dina arbetsuppgifter tar du ansvar för att nå uppsatta mål. Samtidigt har du förmågan att fatta nödvändiga beslut inom ditt ansvarsområde. Som kommunikativ person bygger du starka relationer med kollegor och säkerställer att frågor lyfts för att undvika missförstånd. Du uttrycker dig tydligt och bidrar till en transparent och effektiv dialog inom organisationen.



För oss är dina personliga egenskaper viktiga, därför kommer vi lägga stor vikt vid dessa.



Vi söker dig som har:


* Utbildning i systemutveckling
* Erfarenhet av .NET (C#)
* Erfarenhet av MVC
* Erfarenhet av Git och CI/CD-pipelines
* Goda kunskaper i svenska

Det är även meriterande om du har:


* Erfarenhet av arbete med loggning och monitorering, via applikationer som Seq eller Splunk
* Erfarenhet kring containerteknologier, företrädelsevis Podman som används på PTS
* Erfarenhet av SQL och databaser
* Erfarenhet av integrationsarbete
* Erfarenhet av arbete med REST-API:er
* Erfarenhet av arbete med kundregistersystem
* Arbetslivserfarenhet relevant för tjänsten från större företag eller myndighet
* Goda kunskaper i engelska


**Vårt erbjudande**  

Vi tar livet på allvar. Hos oss kan du ha ett liv på och utanför jobbet. Mår du bra, mår vi bra. Därför erbjuder vi konkurrenskraftiga löner, flexibla arbetstider och möjlighet till distansarbete. Vi har även generöst friskvårdsbidrag och två friskvårdstimmar varje vecka.



Dessutom får du förmånliga villkor för lunch, semester, föräldraledighet, pension och vid sjukdom. Här kommer du arbeta i moderna aktivitetsbaserade lokaler på Hälsingegatan 38. Som statlig myndighet erbjuder vi en trygg och stabil arbetsmiljö där du kan känna dig säker. Vi skapar morgondagens samhälle och måste ligga i framkant. Hos oss kommer du att växa med uppgifter hela tiden.


**Bra att veta**  

Anställningen är en särskild visstidsanställning med start omgående och löper som längst till och med 20250701. Placering i Stockholm med start snarast möjligt enligt överenskommelse. Din tjänstetitel blir systemutvecklare.  

  

För att vi ska kunna göra en rättvis och objektiv bedömning av din kompetens ber vi dig att inte inkludera bild, personnummer eller adress i ditt CV. Vi har valt att inte efterfråga personligt brev då vi istället använder urvalsfrågor. Detta för att vi vill lägga fokus på din erfarenhet och kompetens, vilket bidrar till en mer effektiv och rättvis rekryteringsprocess. Tester kommer att ingå i processen. Om du har skyddade uppgifter, vänligen kontakta vår HR-specialist.



För ytterligare information, vänligen kontakta enhetschef Charlotte Örnlid på charlotte.ornlid@pts.se eller HR-specialist Isabelle Flygelholm på isabelle.flygelholm@pts.se. För frågor relaterade till vår lokala fackliga arbetstagarorganisation, vänligen maila till saco@pts.se.


**Välkommen med din ansökan senast 11 december 2024.**


**Vi driver och försvarar allas rätt till säker och tillgänglig kommunikation. Varje dag, varje sekund. I hela Sverige.**

Länk till den här sidanhttps://www.pts.se/om-oss/jobba-hos-oss/lediga-jobb/?rmpage=job&rmjob=540&rmlang=SE

title: Systemutvecklare Java sökes till Sundsvall & Luleå!
description:
Hos **Knowit** får du inte bara möjligheten att arbeta med spännande projekt – du blir en del av en gemenskap där innovation, utveckling och laganda står i fokus. Som konsult hos oss får du tillgång till varierande uppdrag inom både privat och offentlig sektor, där du har möjlighet att forma framtidens system och bygga starka kundrelationer. Tillsammans skapar vi en utvecklingsplan som speglar dina ambitioner och öppnar dörrar för din fortsatta karriärresa.


**Är det dig vi söker?**


Vi söker en engagerad och erfaren systemutvecklare som älskar att utforska ny teknik och arbeta i ett kreativt team. Du har:


* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av Java-utveckling.
* En positiv och driven inställning, samt ett genuint intresse för att lära och dela kunskap.
* En relevant högskole-/universitetsutbildning eller yrkeshögskola.
* Flytande kunskaper i svenska, både i tal och skrift.

**Därför kommer du att trivas hos oss**


Vi erbjuder mer än bara ett jobb – vi erbjuder en arbetsplats som inspirerar och stöttar dig i varje steg. Här får du:


* Möjlighet att arbeta med välkända kunder inom olika branscher.
* Starka värderingar kring jämställdhet och hållbart ledarskap.
* Kollegor som inte bara är kunniga utan också fantastiska att ha vid sin sida.
* Aktiviteter som stärker både gemenskapen och din hälsa – allt från träningspass till roliga prova-på-aktiviteter.
* Våra medarbetare har också möjlighet till ledighet mellan jul och trettondagen tack vare vår förkortade arbetstid.
* Våra medarbetare beskriver kulturen och kollegorna som det bästa med att jobba på Knowit. Hos oss är trivsel och utveckling lika viktigt som att leverera resultat.

**Ansök idag!**


Berätta för oss vem du är, dina erfarenheter och vad som motiverar dig i din karriär. Vad brinner du för? Vad vill du utvecklas inom? Vi ser fram emot att lära känna dig!


För frågor om tjänsten eller oss på Knowit, kontakta gärna Olise Östmark, ansvarig rekryterare: Olise.ostmark@knowit.se


*Vi ser fram emot din ansökan – bli en del av Knowit och skapa framtiden tillsammans med oss!*

title: BB Software Developer
description:
Are you our next newly graduated, curious software professional to build our Baseband Software for 5G and 6G?

 **About this opportunity:**

  

We are currently seeking recent graduates to bolster our team!

  

When joining Ericsson, you are empowered to learn, lead and perform at your best, shaping the future of technology and you will have an opportunity to rotate between our different teams to build networks and learn more about technical domains. This is a place where you are welcomed as your own perfectly unique self, and celebrated for the skills, talent, and perspective you bring to the team.

  

Together with your team, you will be responsible for new functionality - from feature systemization to customer acceptance as well as maintenance of current products. The team systemize, design and test the software and take joint responsibility for all team tasks.

 **What you will do:**

  

Your focus will be in the Baseband SW – which is a vital part in our current market leading 5G Radio Access Network (RAN) solution. We are looking for people to expand our teams, focusing on either Physical Layer (L1) or Scheduler (L2). Looking forward, the teams will move into 6G as technology and standard progress.

  

Together with your fellow Baseband SW developers, you will:

* Build outstanding baseband software using C/C++, Python.
* Participate in the studies, implementation, and verification of new 5G features and upcoming 6G standard.
* Support and participate in innovation activities across organizations
* Work in a multi-functional, multi-cultural environment with supportive teammates.

 **The skills you bring:**

  

* Master of Science degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, Wireless Communication, Electrical or Electronic Engineering or equivalent.
* Curiosity, a desire, and skills to be a great embedded software developer with a special interest in the C/C++ programming language for real time systems.
* A forward-thinking, focused and creative personality. We love extraordinary teammates who enjoy a fast-paced work environment and challenges.
* Dedication and a genuine interest in the latest technology trends.
* Passion to wrestle with problems no one else has solved before.

  

You have an open mind and like to take on new challenges to continuously improve, and to work outside your own field to broaden your competence and get a deeper understanding of our products. In addition, we value knowledge and experience in 5G and 4G wireless communication e.g. 3GPP specifications, traffic scheduling, signal processing, RF or air interface measurements, x86 or multi-core DSP programming or design patterns in a real-time embedded environment.

 **Last date to apply is 20th December**

**Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || [[location\_obj]]

title: Next Generation: RAN Developer
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About the Opportunity**

  

5G and Cloud RAN are already a reality, and Ericsson is the leader in bringing it to the market. There has never been a better time for you to make your mark. A large group of skilled developers are working energetically to convert 5G and Cloud RAN plans into reality. We are growing and looking for more talent.  

PEU RAN Performance PEG L2 SW is part of Integrated RAN in BA Networks and responsible for driving Baseband software product development end to end by having competence and capability to take on full feature responsibility.  

You will experience a truly collaborative and supportive environment, both in terms of tools and colleagues. And you will have lots of fun. PEU RAN Performance is located mainly on different sites in Sweden, Canada, China and US. This position is located at the Stockholm Kista site.

 **What You Will Do**

  

Be part of RAN teams with focus on systemization, design, trouble shooting and in feature verification. You will be exposed to high edge integrated and cloud RAN products. Here at Ericsson, our culture is built on over a century of courageous decisions. With us, you will no longer be dreaming of what the future holds – you will be redefining it. You won’t develop for the status quo but will build what replaces it. Joining us is a way to move your career in any direction you want; with hundreds of career opportunities in locations all over the world, in a place where co-creation and collaboration are embedded into the walls. You will find yourself in a speak-up environment where empathy and humanness serve as cornerstones for how we work, and where work-life balance is a priority. Welcome to an inclusive, global company where your chance to create an impact is endless.

 **The Skills You Bring**

* BSc level (MSc preferred) in a technical field or the equivalent level of knowledge.
* Programming skills in C, C++, Python.
* Basic Real time embedded systems knowledge.
* Telecom/RAN knowledge, ML/AI hands-on knowledge.
* A productive, creative mindset can help you interact easily with other people.
 **Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.

title: Front-End Software Engineer - Planboo
company_industry: Non-profit Organizations and Primary and Secondary Education
description:
Hi! We're excited you're here :)
   

  

 This opening is for our partner, Planboo.
   

  

 We help organizations around the world build teams for a sustainable future. Together we are on a mission to leverage technology to regenerate our planet and advance human potential.
   

  

 Planboo is committed to revolutionizing carbon removal through innovative biochar solutions. Working with climate-conscious businesses, farmers, land stewards, and biochar producers, Planboo provides the tools, technology, and training needed to transform sustainably sourced biomass into biochar, generating carbon removal credits and enhancing soil health. Their mission is to permanently remove CO₂ from the atmosphere, supporting people and food systems to prosper.
   

  

**The Challenge**
 Are you a Front-End Developer passionate about creating intuitive and impactful user experiences across web and mobile platforms? At Planboo, you'll play a critical role in developing the interfaces that connect users to our groundbreaking biochar technology. You'll collaborate closely with our backend engineers and cross-functional teams to build responsive, high-performing applications that advance our mission.
   

  

**Your challenge:** 
 Build and enhance user-friendly web and mobile applications that drive global carbon removal initiatives.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Feature Development: Take ownership of feature development from concept to deployment, delivering reliable, scalable solutions
* User Experience: Work closely with product designers to deliver an engaging user experience
* Problem Solving: Tackle a wide range of technical challenges, contributing ideas and solutions to improve Planboo's products
* Testing & Feedback: Conduct user testing and implement feedback-driven improvements. Write UI and Unit tests to to ensure code quality and prevent regressions
* Collaboration: Collaborate with backend teams to integrate APIs and services


**Requirements**
**What We're Looking For**
* 3+ years of experience in React and React Native development
* Strong proficiency in Javascript/Typescript
* Experience in API integration and working with backend teams
* Local Storage & Sync: Experience in optimizing local storage usage and implement data synchronization strategies for offline and online modes
* Experience in writing UI tests and Unit tests to ensure code quality and prevent regressions
* Experience in user testing strategies and implementing feedback-driven improvements
* Experience in Performance Optimization\*\*:\*\* Ensuring optimal performance and responsiveness of applications across all systems
* Familiarity with UI/UX design principles and responsive design
* Passion for building mission-driven products


**Nice-to-Haves**
* Backend knowledge in Node.js, AWS services, and familiarity with microservices or serverless architectures
* Familiarity with AWS services like S3, or ECS
* Prior experience in Native Mobile Development


**Benefits**
**What We Offer You**
* An opportunity to make a measurable, positive impact on global carbon removal efforts
* The chance to work directly with Planboo's leadership team and contribute to high-level strategic decision-making
* A flexible, mission-driven work environment with room for personal and professional growth
* Travel opportunities to project locations, including spending time in Sri Lanka for several weeks


**Who We Are**
 Join a diverse team of engineers, farmers, scientists, and visionaries tackling global challenges. We believe in Win-Win collaboration, Relentlessness, and Authenticity. Planboo is committed to advancing CO2 removal, addressing global inequality, and fostering a workplace where diversity of thought is celebrated.
   

  

 Planboo is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer, and we encourage applicants of all backgrounds to apply.

title: Backend Software Engineer (Node.js, Typescript)
description:
**Job Description**
 Are you passionate about building scalable and efficient backend systems for headless ecommerce platforms? We are seeking a highly skilled Backend Engineer specializing in Node.js, TypeScript and Azure to join our dynamic team. As a key member of our development team, you will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and maintaining robust backend solutions that power headless ecommerce applications. You will work in an agile team and collaborate with our product managers, lead engineers, and frontend engineers to deliver high-quality, scalable, and resilient software solutions. The ideal candidate is passionate about backend development, has a strong understanding of JavaScript/ TypeScript principles, and keeps up to date with the latest trends and best practices in backend development using Node.js.
   

  

 In addition to the above, your role will involve:
   

  

**API Design** 
 : Collaborating on the design and implementation of APIs that facilitate seamless communication between the frontend and backend, ensuring an efficient flow of data in the headless ecommerce environment.
   

  

**Databases (SQL/ NoSQL)** 
 : Contributing to data modelling and database design, optimizing storage and retrieval mechanisms to align with the requirements of a headless ecommerce architecture.
   

  

**Azure Cloud** 
 : Leveraging your expertise in Azure Cloud services to enhance the scalability, reliability, and performance of our backend systems, ensuring a seamless integration with our headless ecommerce applications.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Proven experience as a Backend Engineer with a focus on Node.js and TypeScript
* Expertise in API design and development, with a strong understanding of RESTful and GraphQL principles.
* Experience in integrating data from diverse sources into backend systems.
* Proficiency in database management (both SQL and NoSQL), with knowledge of data modelling and design principles.
* Experience in Azure Cloud services and their application in backend development.
* Familiarity with headless ecommerce architecture and best practices.
* Familiarity with testing frameworks and tools, such as Jest, Mocha, Chai, or similar.
* Knowledge about Containerization Technologies (Kubernetes) is a plus.
* Good to have knowledge on Centra (headless eCommerce) and Storyblok (headless CMS)
* Should have knowledge on CI/ CD pipelines using GitHub actions.
* Troubleshoot and resolve issues, bugs, and performance bottlenecks.
* Conduct code reviews, identify areas of improvement, and provide constructive feedback to maintain code quality and consistency.
* Write clean, well-documented code and ensure proper version control using Git or other version control systems.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.


**Additional Information**
 This is a
 **fulltime permanent position** 
 , starting as soon as possible according to agreement. The role is an on-site position, based in our office in Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

 Apply by sending in your
 **CV in English** 
 as soon as possible, but no later than the
 **15th of December.** 
 Due to data policies, we only accept applications through career page.
   

  

**Benefits**
 We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET, Afound. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
   

  

 In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.
   

  

**Inclusion & Diversity**
 H&M is a part of H&M Group. At H&M Group, we’re determined to create and maintain inclusive, diverse and equitable workplaces throughout our organisation. Our teams should consist of a variety of people that share and combine their knowledge, experience and ideas. Having a diverse workforce leads to a positive impact on how we address challenges, on what we perceive possible and on how we choose to relate to our colleagues and customers all over the world. Hence all diversity dimensions are taken into consideration in our recruitment process.
   

  

 We are committed to a recruitment process that is fair, equitable, and based on competency. We therefore kindly ask you to not attach a cover letter in your application.
   

  

**Company Description**
 H&M is a fashion brand that offers the latest styles and inspiration, from fashion pieces and unique designer collaborations to affordable wardrobe essentials. Our business idea is fashion & quality at the best price in a sustainable way. Learn more about H&M here.

title: Frontend Developer
description:
**Join Mighty as a Front-End Developer! 🚀** 




  





 We are looking for a Frontend Developer with over three years of experience, skilled in building engaging and user-friendly web interfaces. The ideal candidate should have strong proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and modern frameworks like React or Svelte. A strong focus on UX/UI design is critical, along with practical experience using tools like Figma to collaborate closely with designers and deliver visually stunning, highly functional web experiences.
 



  





**About Mighty** 




 At Mighty, we are a team of multidisciplinary digital product experts, we are a dynamic team of experts partnering with some of the most forward-thinking companies. 
 



  





 We amplify design and development capabilities, putting user experience and interface design at the forefront to craft seamless digital experiences that delight users and drive business success. If you thrive in an environment that values collaboration, innovation and every team member’s voice; this role could be your perfect fit!
 



  





**About the role** 




 The role includes creating reusable code, improving design systems and front-end architecture. Working closely with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative, user-centered and visually engaging solutions aligned with business objectives.
 



  





 Excellent communication skills and a collaborative mindset are essential for fostering effective teamwork across disciplines. Experience working in an Agile environment is a plus, as is a passion for staying ahead of front-end trends and pushing the boundaries of digital innovation.
 



  
 



**Responsibilities** 



* Develop & designing responsive, high-performance front-end applications using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and frameworks like React or Svelte
* Build reusable code and libraries for future use
* Focus on performance optimization and ensure that all user interfaces are intuitive, visually appealing, and aligned with the latest industry trends and standards
* Contribute to the continuous improvement of our design systems and front-end architecture
* Work closely with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions that meet both user and business needs



  





**Qualifications** 



* 3+ years' experience in frontend development
* Familiarity using Scrum/Agile development methodologies
* Experience building object oriented web applications in JavaScript & React

title: Frontend Engineer
description:
Do you want to challenge the status quo and be a part of the disruptive innovation that’s changing the traditional banking services?
   

  

 Do you want to work in an entrepreneurial environment yet have all the perks from being a part of an international media company?
   

  

 If yes, then take the opportunity to join the FinTech superstar Lendo. Lendo has already established a strong position in the Nordics. The newly acquired PSD2 licence creates opportunities in open banking, enabling us to further develop our value proposition and drive scalability in more markets.
   

  

**What You Tell Your Friends You Do**
 I am a developer at Lendo, where I'm enhancing proven products and establishing new ones within the loan comparison, account services and payment areas.
   

  

**What You Will Really Be Doing**
* Use a modern technology stack such as React, Javascript, Kubernetes, Docker, RabbitMQ, PostgreSQL...etc.
* Create exciting new products and features
* Build, design and optimize components to make them reusable for Lendo in multiple countries
* Build software that is used daily by a great number of user
* Collaborate closely with colleagues and the business to increase value for our users
* Prioritize work with the team and its Product Owner.
* Write tests at different levels to ensure quality and that your code really does what you want
* Identify and keep track of metrics that tell you how your software is performing
* Be creative and brainstorm ideas for ways we can further streamline our development
* Bring your own unique skill set to the table
* You’ll become part of an international, agile, multidisciplinary team that loves to discuss and solve problems in the group.
* You’ll experiment, test, try, fail and learn all the time


**We offer**
* A place for everyone - You are welcome at Lendo for who you are, no matter where you come from or what you look like. Our product is for everyone, and so is our workplace!
* Room for you to do things your way
* We like to inspire your passion by organizing hackathons and other knowledge-sharing event
* A wellness program, if you want to do yoga, meditation, running and other activities with colleagues and coaches
* 4 000 SEK health promotion allowance
* 30 days of paid leave
* Super central location in Stockholm
* And yes, we also have the industry standard perks such as ping pong tables, team activities, and fun parties!

title: Senior Software Engineer - Planboo
company_industry: Non-profit Organizations and Primary and Secondary Education
description:
Hi! We're excited you're here :)
   

  

 This opening is for our partner, Planboo.
   

  

 We help organizations around the world build teams for a sustainable future. Together we are on a mission to leverage technology to regenerate our planet and advance human potential.
   

  

 Planboo is committed to revolutionizing carbon removal through innovative biochar solutions. Working with climate-conscious businesses, farmers, land stewards, and biochar producers, Planboo provides the tools, technology, and training needed to transform sustainably sourced biomass into biochar, generating carbon removal credits and enhancing soil health. Their mission is to permanently remove CO₂ from the atmosphere, supporting people and food systems to prosper.
   

  

**The Challenge**
 Are you an experienced Backend Engineer looking to take on a leadership role in a mission-driven organization? As the
 **Tech Lead Software Engineer** 
 at Planboo, you will architect and build scalable backend systems that power our innovative biochar solutions. You will spearhead the brainstorming and development of creative solutions to complex technical challenges, working closely with your team and cross-functional teams to drive our mission forward.
   

  

**Your challenge:** 
 Lead the development of robust systems that scale our carbon removal technology globally.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Technical Leadership: Set the technical direction and establish best practices that enable the team to succeed in building reliable and scalable software
* Product Development: Collaborate with the product team to continuously improve existing products and develop new features that align with our roadmap
* Team Mentorship: Guide and support team members as the team grows, providing technical mentorship and fostering a collaborative work environment
* Integration: Collaborate with hardware teams for software-hardware integration
* Backend Development: Architect and develop scalable backend services
* DevOps & CI/CD: Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines, and manage containerization using Docker
* Cloud Infrastructure: Manage and optimize cloud resources on AWS, leveraging services like ECS, S3, RDS and Lambda
* Microservices & Scalability: Design and implement robust, scalable, and fault-tolerant systems
* Data Management: Work with relational databases(PostgreSQL, MySQL).
* Security & Performance: Ensure system security, scalability, and performance optimization


**Requirements**
**What We're Looking For**
* 6+ years of experience in Software Engineering
* Experience with software development, system design, and architecture
* Experience with developing RESTful APIs and integrating third-party API's
* Strong expertise in AWS and cloud-native tools
* Strong understanding of CI/CD tools and modern software design patterns for scalable and maintainable systems
* Experience in managing containerization using Docker
* Knowledge of security frameworks for user and service authentication and authorization
* Strong problem-solving skills and a passion for mission-driven work
* Having taken on a leadership role in a project or team setting


**Nice-to-Haves**
* Experience with TypeScript/JavaScript
* Experience with headless CMS platforms
* Familiarity with BI integration tools (such as Metabase, Tableau, Power BI, or Looker)
* Knowledge in serverless architecture
* Experience with hardware or IoT-integrated solutions
* Experience with carbon removal projects, embedded systems, or working in international, mission-driven teams


**Benefits**
**What We Offer You**
* An opportunity to make a measurable, positive impact on global carbon removal efforts
* The chance to work directly with Planboo's leadership team and contribute to high-level strategic decision-making
* A flexible, mission-driven work environment with room for personal and professional growth
* Travel opportunities to project locations, including spending time in Sri Lanka for several weeks


**Who We Are**
 Join a diverse team of engineers, farmers, scientists, and visionaries tackling global challenges. We believe in Win-Win collaboration, Relentlessness, and Authenticity. Planboo is committed to advancing CO2 removal, addressing global inequality, and fostering a workplace where diversity of thought is celebrated.
   

  

 Planboo is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer, and we encourage applicants of all backgrounds to apply.

title: Full Stack Software Engineer (Typescript/Vue.js)
description:
**Job Description**
 Join us at H&M as a Software Engineer for the Google Cloud Engineering team. We craft cloud strategies to ensure H&M's infrastructure is user-friendly, secure, and cost-effective. Through self-service options and automation, we empower our product teams to kickstart their projects swiftly. We provide golden patterns, security measures, and cost optimization solutions at scale.
   

  

 Our goal is to equip product teams with the resources and knowledge to utilize the cloud effectively from day one. Additionally, we are committed to enhancing the developer experience and boosting engineering efficiency.
   

  

 At H&M, we are all about teamwork and fun. Join us in embracing creativity, delivering value, and making a difference together!
   

  

 As a Software Engineer on our team, you will design, develop, and maintain high-quality software solutions tailored to our organization's needs. Your primary focus will be on GCP Project Factory codes, enabling self-service project management and creating central services to enhance engineering efficiency.
   

  

 In this role, you will collaborate closely with team members to effectively leverage cloud services in an agile environment. By utilizing your expertise in modern architecture and software design patterns, you will empower product teams to develop scalable, maintainable, and innovative solutions for our customers. The ideal candidate has a strong background in software development, a passion for technology, and a drive for continuous learning and improvement.
   

  

**Key responsibilities:**
* Design, develop, and implement software solutions that align with project goals and meet quality standards.
* Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code using best practices and appropriate software design patterns.
* Perform unit testing, debugging, code reviews, and participating in Agile development activities.
* Develop the cloud landing zone and governance framework that serves as the foundation for all product teams.
* Develop central platform services with innovative solutions aimed at streamlining developer efficiency.
* Focus on enablement, automation and building self-service capabilities.
* Stay up to date with emerging technologies and industry trends to propose innovative solutions and improvements.


**Qualifications**
**What you need to succeed:**
* Minimum 4-8 years of hands-on experience in application development.
* Strong proficiency in Terraform and experience working with CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions.
* Strong hands-on experience with TypeScript.
* Knowledge of Vue.js or similar frontend frameworks.
* Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot complex issues.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
* Experience with Agile development methodologies like Scrum, Kanban, or SAFe.
* Experience with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) is nice to have.
* Understanding of security best practices in cloud environments.


**Additional Information**
 This is a
 **fulltime permanent position** 
 , starting as soon as possible according to agreement. The role is an on-site position, based in our office in Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

 Apply by sending in your
 **CV in English** 
 as soon as possible, but no later than the
 **15th of December.** 
 Due to data policies, we only accept applications through career page.
   

  

**Benefits**
 We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET, Afound. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
   

  

*In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.*
**Inclusion & Diversity**
 H&M is a part of H&M Group. At H&M Group, we’re determined to create and maintain inclusive, diverse and equitable workplaces throughout our organisation. Our teams should consist of a variety of people that share and combine their knowledge, experience and ideas. Having a diverse workforce leads to a positive impact on how we address challenges, on what we perceive possible and on how we choose to relate to our colleagues and customers all over the world. Hence all diversity dimensions are taken into consideration in our recruitment process.
   

  

*We are committed to a recruitment process that is fair, equitable, and based on competency. We therefore kindly ask you to not attach a cover letter in your application.*
**Company Description**
 H&M is a fashion brand that offers the latest styles and inspiration, from fashion pieces and unique designer collaborations to affordable wardrobe essentials. Our business idea is fashion & quality at the best price in a sustainable way. Learn more about H&M here.

title: Full Stack and AI Developer Intern
description:

 Full Stack and AI Developer Intern

 Remote

 : Unpaid Internship

 Immediate

 3-6 months (Flexible, Part-Time or Full-Time)
 







**Company Description** 




 FlowerWork is an ambitious startup at the cutting edge of innovation, striving to create a unified platform that transforms how companies manage their operations, projects, and teams. We integrate AI, blockchain, and automation to revolutionize processes, making operations seamless and efficient. As an early-stage startup, we’re in the exciting phase of building our foundation and growing our team.
 








**Role Description** 




 This is an internship remote role for a Full Stack and AI Developer at FlowerWork. The developer will be responsible for tasks such as back-end and front-end web development, software development, and CSS implementation. The role will involve working on various projects remotely.
 







**Qualifications** 



* Back-End Web Development, Full-Stack Development, and Software Development skills.
* Front-End Development and Cascading Style Sheets (CSS).
* Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
* Experience with AI development is a plus.
* Ability to work independently and collaboratively.
* Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
* Enrolled in a relevant degree program or equivalent experience.

* Build and maintain front-end and back-end features for web applications.
* Implement and optimize AI models to enhance automation within the platform.
* Develop responsive, user-friendly interfaces.

* Work with team members on new features and participate in code reviews.

 .**

 This internship is unpaid, but offers a valuable experience in a startup environment.

 This is a fully remote position, allowing you to work from anywhere.

 We are flexible with the duration and can accommodate both part-time and full-time candidates.

title: Senior Fullstack Developer
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Rollen:**
* Möjliggöra och underlätta den bästa möjliga lösningsdesignen och tekniska lösningen för att implementeras utifrån ett helhetsperspektiv på kundupplevelse.
* Använd din djupa kunskap om produktens tekniska uppsättning och användning för att kontinuerligt iterera och leverera produktförbättringar tillsammans med dina kollegor och Produktägare.
* Säkerställ att våra lösningar är säkra, robusta och hållbara (secure software development)
* Underlätta samarbetet med ingenjörer, Produktägare och UX-designers för att översätta krav till användarberättelser och tekniska lösningar.
* Främja högklassiga mjukvaruutvecklingsmetoder för att kontinuerligt leverera funktioner och förbättringar av hög kvalitet.
* Du använder, förespråkar och sprider moderna hållbara agila mjukvaruutvecklingsmetoder samt delar din kunskap inom teamet och i guilds


**Ska-krav:**
 Erfarenhet (mer än 3 år) av:
   

  

* Angular (version 14+)
* HTML5
* CSS
* TypeScript
* JavaScript
* Azure DevOps
* Git & Gitflow
* MS Azure, MS Visual Studio
* CI/CD
* CMS EpiServer/Optimizly
* C# 3-4 (.NET Framework + .NET Core 7 och uppåt)
* Utöver svenska, talar flytande engelska både i tal och skrift.


**Meriterande:**
* Webbanalysverktyg som Google analytics eller Piwik PRO
* Sätta upp SQL och databaser
* Förstå authentication och Open identity
* Att sätta upp automationstester och testa flitigt inför release
* Har använt SonarQube eller Github Advance


**Sista ansökningdag: 19-12-2024**
**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Developer Support Engineer for Data Calling
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 As a Developer Support Engineer, you will be responsible for enhancing the developer experience by continuously improving our reference implementations, sample apps, and documentation, while providing top-notch support to our clients' developers. You'll troubleshoot customer integrations of our SDKs and APIs, track FAQs, and identify patterns that highlight potential SDK improvements. Our SDKs use WebRTC technology, making it easy to add real-time, in-app voice and video calling to our clients' websites or apps.
   

  

* Handle and analyse third-line support inquiries to ensure our FAQs remain relevant.
* Help keep our developer documentation up-to-date and user-friendly.
* Build reference implementations and sample apps to simplify the integration of our voice, video, and verification SDKs.
* Collaborate closely with other engineers to stay informed about important updates and new releases.
* Focus on quality assurance and provide first-class support to developers.
* Communicate effectively with clients, ensuring their technical issues are resolved promptly and clearly.
* Conduct QA testing of SDKs on mobile devices to ensure optimal performance and usability.


**Requirements**
* Degree in IT, engineering, or a related field, or equivalent work experience.
* High proficiency in English, particularly in writing.
* Strong communication skills, with experience in handling customer support.
* Experience in app development or relevant development roles.
* Strong understanding of the development process and effective communication with developers.
* Interest in voice and video calling technologies.


**Good to have**
* Familiarity with Android and iOS application development (Kotlin, Swift).
* Experience of using tools such as Datadog and Kibana for monitoring systems and performing root cause analysis through detailed log and metric exploration.
* Previous experience in a similar support role.
* Experience with voice and video calling.
* Familiarity with WebRTC technology, IP networks or telecom networks.
* Experience in manual and automated QA testing of SDKs on mobile devices.


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!
